mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, n.NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, n.NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, n.ADMIN_ID AS adminId, a.ADMIN_NAME AS adminName, n.NOTICE_STAT AS noticeStat, n.REG_DT AS regDt, n.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM NOTICE n LEFT JOIN ADMIN a ON n.ADMIN_ID = a.ADMIN_ID WHERE n.NOTICE_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY n.REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_ID) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{adminId})
INSERT INTO NOTICE_REPLY (REPLY_SEQ, NOTICE_SEQ, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (NOTICE_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeSeq}, #{userId}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE_REPLY WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq} ORDER BY REPLY_SEQ
